original_text: You are the same as that. Other people look at you. They think that you are good and you obey God. But on the inside you are hypocrites. Your minds are full of many bad thoughts.
korean_text: 이와 같이 너희도 겉으로는 사람에게 옳게 보이되 안으로는 외식과 불법이 가득하도다

sentences.original_text: You are the same as that.
They think that you are good
But on the inside you are hypocrites.
Your minds are full of many bad thoughts.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 마음에는 많은 나쁜 생각들로 가득하다.
